short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Net iD for Chrome OS, meant to enable smart cards for Citrix and TLS

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Net iD for Chrome OS requires a license from Pointsharp AB.
The software enables smart cards and Yubikeys for mutual TLS for the Chrome browser and for Citrix.
NOTE: This software will soon be published under Pointsharp and the app(extension) from SecMaker will be removed.
